function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to social distancing measures","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote and incentivize adherence to social distancing measures through support systems and continuous provision of essential services","Technologies":"Digital communication tools for remote interaction, online platforms for essential service delivery","People":"General public, vulnerable groups","Owner":"Public health authorities, government, community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of community engagement in containment strategy","Impact":"Exponential spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement targeted community interventions with public engagement to delay the spread of COVID-19","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, online communication tools","People":"General public, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"Scientific uncertainties about COVID-19","Impact":"Inability to apply effective mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Conduct ongoing research and communicate uncertainties to public health authorities and the general public to inform adaptive strategies","Technologies":"Research tools for virus study, communication platforms for sharing information","People":"Public health authorities, scientists, researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities, scientific institutions"}]}
